name: Frontline: Western Front
description:
"Frontline: Western Front" is a tactical scale strategy game that invites the players to take command of the Allied or German forces in an epic struggle for the liberation of Western Europe!

"The variety of maps and battle situations is what makes "Frontline" so different and engaging! Strategy and Squad coordination, the study of enemy tactics and use of Special abilities will lead to victory!"
Units unlock new behaviors such as Transport, Camouflage, APCR, Artillery barrage, Over-watch, Smoke, Special Panzers, sabotage, and much more!

FEATURES:
✔️100+ animated units
✔️5 Campaigns
✔️10 Challenging Sandbox scenarios
✔️Level up & Active abilities
✔️Reinforcements
✔️Unique objectives
✔️Zoom controls
✔️No ADS
✔️No IAP
